      • getBestLCS

        public java.lang.Object[] getBestLCS(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> lcses,
                            boolean intrinsicIC,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> conceptFilter)
        Description copied from interface: ConceptSimilarityService
        get the best lcs
        Specified by:
        getBestLCS in interface ConceptSimilarityService
        Parameters:
        lcses - set of lcses
        intrinsicIC - should the intrinsic ic be used? false - use corpus-based ic. For multiple lcses not using concept filter, use the lcs with the lowest infocontent
        conceptFilter - limit to lcses in the concept filter. The lcs with the highest value will be used.
        Returns:
        array with 2 entries. Entry 1 - lcs (String). Entry 2 - infocontent (double). Null if no lcses are in the concept filter.

      • getBestLCS

        public java.lang.Object[] getBestLCS(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> lcses,

      • loadConceptFilter

        public double loadConceptFilter(java.lang.String label,
                       int rankCutoff,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> conceptFilter)
        For the given label and cutoff, get the corresponding concepts whose propagated ig meets the threshold. Used by lin kernel to find concepts that actually have a non-trivial similarity
        Specified by:
        loadConceptFilter in interface ConceptSimilarityService
        Parameters:
        label - label
        rankCutoff - cutoff
        conceptFilter - set to fill with concepts
        Returns:
        double minimum evaluation
